title: Child of a Cruel God
description: From award-winning author Padraig O'Hannon, the sequel to "Murder in County Tyrone."He thought it was over. He was wrong.Three years after discovering who carried out the deadly 1998 terrorist attack in Northern Ireland, American attorney John Costa just wants to get on with his life. Fate, however, has other plans. His world is shattered when an old adversary returns with a vengeance, making him the pawn in a deadly game of deceit and intrigue.
author: Padraig O'Hannon
